content: *made from minute quantities of leftover sock yarn these leaves make lovely little gift tags or they can become gifts in their own right ideas and pictures can be found in the pattern just the kind of project for a few stolen moments portable easy once you ve made a couple and finished in no time the instructions are for three different sizes * **finished measurements** approx 3 x 4 cm 1 2 x 1 6 3 5 x 5 5 cm 1 4 x 2 2 4 5 x 6 5 cm 1 8 x 2 6 width x height for sizes s m and l respectively excluding the stalk more information and inspiration can be found in this blog post 1 a blog post about how to make an earrings-and-pendant set using this pattern picture bottom left can be found here 2 1 https //www meruladesigns com/knitting/gift-leaves/ 2 https //www meruladesigns com/knitting/knit-leaf-earrings-and-pendant/
